City Council
============

Physical Address:

310 N Main Street  
Elgin, TX 78621

Mailing Address:

PO Box 591  
Elgin, TX 78621

Phone:

[512-229-3222](tel:5122293222)

Fax:

512-285-3016

Link: [Mayor and Council Page](https://elgintexas.gov/149/Mayor-Council)
